places.name: The Restful Lantern
places.description: A cozy inn with flickering lanterns and a warm fireplace. It serves as a hub for rest and rumors.

places.name: Wyrdwell General Store
places.description: A cluttered shop selling basic items, run by the nervous merchant Edwin.

places.name: Black Anvil Forge
places.description: A sturdy workshop filled with the rhythmic clang of hammer on metal. It offers weapon and armor upgrades.

places.name: The Whispering Brew
places.description: A cozy, dimly lit shop filled with the earthy aroma of dried herbs and simmering potions. Shelves line the walls, crowded with vials of glowing liquids, jars of rare ingredients, and weathered alchemical tools. A cauldron bubbles gently in the corner, emitting a soft, green mist.
